'''Dueno''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Dueno is another member of the ill-fated [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/) expedition to the ruins of [Poko Kohara](/pokoKohara/), in search of a source of luminous adra.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/): Can be seen in a spirit vision on level one of the [Engwithan Waystation](/engwithanWaystation/). He is accused by [Falero](/falero/) of pushing [Olara](/olara/) into a spike trap. On the next floor, his body can be found clutching the [Poko Kohara Expedition Log](/pokoKoharaExpeditionLog/), assumedly stolen from [Falero](/falero/). This time Falero blames Beza, whom he finds next to Dueno's body.
[Category:Poko Kohara ruins characters](/categoryPokoKoharaRuinsCharacters/)

'''Dueno''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Dueno is another member of the ill-fated [[Vailian Trading Company]] expedition to the ruins of [[Poko Kohara]], in search of a source of luminous adra.

==Interactions==
{{Interactions

===Quests===
* [[The Storms of Poko Kohara]]: Can be seen in a spirit vision on level one of the [[Engwithan Waystation]]. He is accused by [[Falero]] of pushing [[Olara]] into a spike trap. On the next floor, his body can be found clutching the [[Poko Kohara Expedition Log]], assumedly stolen from [[Falero]]. This time Falero blames Beza, whom he finds next to Dueno's body.
